mapper.sql: ID, BUSINESS_TYPE, COUPON_TYPE, COUPON_ADD, COUPON_NAME, COUPON_CODE, COUPON_PHOTO, USE_DESC, VER_CHANNEL, PAY_TYPE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG, SEND_TYPE, CONDITION_DESC, PERSON_LIMIT, DATE_LIMIT, MACHINE_LIMIT
mapper.insert:
insert into T_COUPON_INFO
id, BUSINESS_TYPE, COUPON_TYPE, COUPON_ADD, COUPON_NAME, COUPON_CODE, COUPON_PHOTO, USE_DESC, VER_CHANNEL, PAY_TYPE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG, SEND_TYPE, CONDITION_DESC, PERSON_LIMIT, DATE_LIMIT, MACHINE_LIMIT,
#{id}, #{businessType}, #{couponType}, #{couponAdd}, #{couponName}, #{couponCode}, #{couponPhoto}, #{useDesc}, #{verChannel}, #{payType}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag}, #{sendType}, #{conditionDesc}, #{personLimit}, #{dateLimit}, #{machineLimit},
mapper.select:
select tci.ID AS couponId, tac.ACTIVITY_ID as activityId, tac.INVENTORY_NUM as inventoryNum, tac.EFFECT_TYPE as effectType, tac.EFFECT_TIME as effectTime, tac.TAKE_DATE_NUM as takeDateNum, tac.EFFECT_DATE_NUM as effectDateNum, (select count(*) from T_USER_COUPON where COUPON_ID in
#{item} ) as receiveNum from T_COUPON_INFO tci left join T_ACTIVITY_COUPON tac on tci.ID = tac.COUPON_ID and tac.DEL_FLAG = 0 left join T_ACTIVITY_INFO tai on tai.ID = tac.ACTIVITY_ID and tai.DEL_FLAG = 0 where tci.DEL_FLAG = 0
and tci.ID in
#{item}

select COUPON_ID AS couponId, INVENTORY_NUM as inventoryNum from T_ACTIVITY_COUPON where DEL_FLAG = 0 and COUPON_ID in
#{item}

SELECT tci.ID AS couponId, tci.COUPON_NAME AS couponName, tci.COUPON_CODE AS couponCode, tai.ACTIVITY_NAME AS activityName, tai.BUDGET AS budget, NVL( sum( tgi.GRANT_NUM ), 0 ) AS sendCouponNum, count( tuc.USER_NO ) AS receiveCouponNum FROM T_COUPON_INFO tci LEFT JOIN T_ACTIVITY_COUPON tac ON tci.ID = tac.COUPON_ID AND tac.DEL_FLAG = 0 LEFT JOIN T_ACTIVITY_INFO tai ON tai.ID = tac.ACTIVITY_ID AND tai.DEL_FLAG = 0 LEFT JOIN T_GRANT_INFO tgi ON tgi.COUPON_ID = tci.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER_COUPON tuc ON tuc.COUPON_ID = tci.ID where tci.DEL_FLAG = 0
and tai.ACTIVITY_NAME like concat(concat('%', #{activityName}), '%')
and tci.COUPON_NAME like concat(concat('%', #{couponName}), '%')
and tci.COUPON_CODE like concat(concat('%', #{couponCode}), '%')
and ((to_char(tai.START_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{params.beginTime} and to_char(tai.START_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{params.endTime}) or (to_char(tai.START_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{params.beginTime} and to_char(tai.END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{params.endTime}) or (to_char(tai.END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{params.beginTime} and to_char(tai.END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{params.endTime}))
GROUP BY tci.ID, tci.COUPON_NAME, tci.COUPON_CODE, tai.ACTIVITY_NAME, tai.BUDGET

select count( * ) as useNum, COUPON_ID as couponId from T_USER_COUPON where STATUS = '2'
and COUPON_ID in
#{item}
GROUP BY COUPON_ID

SELECT count(tai.ID) FROM T_COUPON_INFO tci LEFT JOIN T_ACTIVITY_COUPON tac ON tci.ID = tac.COUPON_ID AND tac.DEL_FLAG = 0 LEFT JOIN T_ACTIVITY_INFO tai ON tai.ID = tac.ACTIVITY_ID AND tai.DEL_FLAG = 0 WHERE tci.DEL_FLAG = 0 and tci.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into T_USER_COUPON
ID, USER_NO, COUPON_ID, STATUS, PHONENUMBER, APP_ACCOUNT, CARD_NUMBER, RECEIVE_TIME, DEVICE_NO, IP_ADDRESS, MAC_ADDRESS, ACTIVITY_ID, WRITE_OFF_CODE, LINK_URL, SEND_TYPE,
#{id}, #{userNo}, #{couponId}, #{status}, #{phoneNumber}, #{appAccount}, #{cardNumber}, #{receiveTime}, #{deviceNo}, #{ipAddress}, #{macAddress}, #{activityId}, #{writeOffCode}, #{linkUrl}, #{sendType},
